mapper.update: UPDATE hdispatch_job SET active=0 WHERE job_id=#{jobId}
mapper.select: SELECT job.* FROM hdispatch_job job JOIN hdispatch_theme theme JOIN hdispatch_layer layer ON job.theme_id=theme.theme_id AND job.layer_id=layer.layer_id WHERE job.active=1 AND theme.active=1 AND layer.active=1 AND job.name=#{jobName} AND job.layer_id=#{layerId} AND job.theme_id=#{themeId}
